alert.note: Alert for Arlington; City of Alexandria; City of Falls Church; King George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 16 at 5:27PM EDT until May 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 230 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND ANNE ARUNDEL PRINCE GEORGES IN NORTHEAST MARYLAND CECIL IN NORTHERN MARYLAND BALTIMORE BALTIMORE CITY HARFORD IN SOUTHERN MARYLAND CALVERT CHARLES ST. MARYS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA KING GEORGE IN NORTHERN VIRGINIA ARLINGTON CITY OF ALEXANDRIA CITY OF FALLS CHURCH THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABERDEEN, ALEXANDRIA, ANNAPOLIS, ARLINGTON, ARNOLD, BALTIMORE, BEL AIR, BOWIE, CALIFORNIA, CAMP SPRINGS, CATONSVILLE, CHESAPEAKE BEACH, CLINTON, COLLEGE PARK, DAHLGREN, DUNDALK, DUNKIRK, EDGEWOOD, ELKTON, ESSEX, FALLS CHURCH, FALLSTON, GLEN BURNIE, GREENBELT, HAVRE DE GRACE, HUNTINGTOWN, JOPPATOWNE, LAUREL, LEXINGTON PARK, LUSBY, NORTH BEACH, ODENTON, PARKVILLE, PIKESVILLE, PRINCE FREDERICK, RANDALLSTOWN, SEVERN, SEVERNA PARK, SOUTH GATE, ST. CHARLES, SUITLAND-SILVER HILL, TOWSON, WALDORF, AND WASHINGTON.
